reviews.review: Игра нереальная, профессиональная. Для настоящих пацанов. Сюжет-просто конфетка)))
The games can and always leave you a sense of satisfaction even though you replay it every month for your entire life
I like this even better than the original. Cave Johnson is the best! If you like puzzle games and you liked the first one, you're gonna love the second!

um jogo genialmente bom recomendo e uma otima experiencia tem personagems engrados mais não engraçados demais um nivel equilibrado.                                                                                           ,                                                                                                                                                                              então a gameplay e otima, os puzzles funcionam bem tem graficos otimos e uma trilha sonora otima tudo no jogo funciona de um jeito OTIMO!(tem muitos otimos nessa analise)                          recomendo zerar o final e OTIMO e o melhor personagem do jogo na minha Humilde opiniao 
e a glados. mais lembre antes de jogar essa obra prima jogue o primeiro jogo que eu tambem recomendo minha nota para esse jogo é OTIMO/10 com uma experiencia muito otima recomendo muito muito mesmo tipo mesmo mesmo,,,,JOGA LOGA E MUITO BOM!!!!

I have played this game tree times, incredible:
- sci fi
- retrofuturistic 
- incredible aesthetics
- script is top notch, unbelievable
- gameplay and control are very good
BETRAER I WARSHIPED HIM THAT LITTEL  BLUE BALL
a verdadeira pergunta nao e se o jogo e bom mas sim ONDE TA MEU BOLO ROBO ESCROTO
it combines amazing game mechanics with a phenomenal story line
Крутая графика и очень долгое прохождение. Светую. Денег не пожелел.
good game, pretty old but aged like wine
Very fun and quite challenging. It helps if your partner is smarter than you. Really does..
This game is really fun and difficult. Console commands in co-op mode are really fun too!
good game, the best portal based 1st person shooter I've come across. Original masterpiece!
Amazing atmosphere, compelling characters, stellar story. Takes the best parts of the original and expands upon them in interesting ways. A classic.
Love this game. Still holds up!
Jogo simplesmente fenomenal, muito divertido, direto e nada cansativo.
топовый сюжет правдо очень много голаваломак а так топчик )
It's Portal 2. Everyone knows it's an incredible game.
i like, very nice is lot of content, good game
demasiado bueno paq se te funda el cerebro
truly a modern masterpiece, now valve please get off your asses and make more games
Spaßig, macht echt laune, ein klassiker und der Koop is auch mega :)
a legit classic. everyone should play this game!
Bestes Rätselspiel, das ich je gespielt habe. Cooles Design der interessanten Spielwelt, kreative und mit der Zeit anspruchsvolle Level und lustige Dialoge der Roboter. Auch der KOOP macht mega Spaß.
This game lets you play alone and with a brother or friend (maybe a sister). I recommend this to anyone who likes puzzles

I don't know how many times I've played the story now and how many workshop maps I've played.
This is a game I can easily pick up any time.
It is Portal, bigger and better. More puzzles, new mechanics, more fun.
Hermoso, para ser sincero me pase la campaña del 1 y 2 <3 simplemente espectacular y la canción final muy emotiva <3 recomendadisimo.
This game is a classic, anyone who hasn't played this definitely should.

This game is amazing. It is just a masterpiece. The game can be difficult at times, but hey, youtube exists to have tutorials on how to beat certain levels. Puzzle games do not need a story, but when they do, they are so much better. That is why the Portal series are so good.
世界观非常吸引我；更让我感兴趣的是整个基地（？）的地图，因为感觉总是在不停的上升和下降，而在其中的时候上面不见天日，下面深不见底，但又有足够的可见光，底部甚至有另外的地面：究竟有多深呢？究竟是怎样的构造呢？要是有设定集之类的就好啦
Fun times if you like being trapped in a colorless room with a bunch of cubes and a fancy assault rifle.
est-il nécessaire de présenter encore ce chef d'oeuvre ? toujours aussi bon des années plus tard
Fun and challenging at times. Love co-op mode.
Jebac gladoss jest szmata jebana i oszukuje w punktacji.
esta piola para pasar el rato
Hra bola riadne zaplatená, nainštalovaná a nefunguje. Nedá sa spustiť. Ani po opakovanom reštarte.

Inventif, drôle, divertissant ! J'ai beaucoup, beaucoup aimé ce jeu. Et pourtant, je n'ai pas encore exploité pleinement toutes les possibilités du jeu, comme le mode Coopération ou la création de stage.
Love this Game. Wish They had a 3 game in the series.
Mind bending puzzles you don't get tired to solve. With the aesthetics of a shooter none of the gore, way more fun.

Portal 2 is a classic. If you don't own it, buy it. It is a must have on every steam account

8/10
Amazing game, even if the [spoiler]old sections of the game[/spoiler]  are a bit too disorienting.
This game is ingenious. I'm not crazy about everything that Valve does, I don't think Half Life 2 was an improvement on the original Half Life, but this is superb.
